name: .GRL File Extension
summary: Learn about .GRL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Status file used by Windows Update; stores information about the current Windows configuration; named either "active.grl" or "pending.grl" and is stored in the \windows\winsxs directory by default.

content: NOTE: If a Window Update produces a "0x80073712" error code, you may need to delete the pending.grl and pending.xml files. Then the update should run successfully.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
